# MewTruCard

> MewTruCard is a modern web application for creating AI-powered animated greeting cards. It offers a wide range of customizable templates for birthdays, anniversaries, love messages, and apologies. The platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with beautiful animations to create personalized digital greeting cards that can be downloaded and shared instantly.

Key Features:
- AI-powered personalization for card messages and designs
- 30000+ animated templates across multiple categories
- Free to use with no watermarks
- Modern, responsive web interface built with Next.js and Tailwind
- Quick download in various formats
